name: puppeteer_page_evaluation
description: Execute JavaScript in page context and extract data

args: const puppeteer = require('puppeteer'); (async () => { const browser = await puppeteer.launch(); const page = await browser.newPage(); await page.goto('https://example.com'); const title = await page.evaluate(() => document.title); const url = await page.evaluate(() => window.location.href); console.log('Title:', title); console.log('URL:', url); await browser.close(); })();

expected_output.example:
Title: Example Domain
URL: https://example.com/

JavaScript executed in page context

args: const puppeteer = require('puppeteer'); (async () => { const browser = await puppeteer.launch(); const page = await browser.newPage(); await page.goto('https://example.com'); const data = await page.evaluate(() => { const heading = document.querySelector('h1').textContent; const paragraphs = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('p')).map(p => p.textContent); return {heading, paragraphs}; }); console.log('Extracted:', JSON.stringify(data, null, 2)); await browser.close(); })();

const puppeteer = require('puppeteer'); (async () => { const browser = await puppeteer.launch(); const page = await browser.newPage(); await page.goto('https://example.com'); await page.evaluate(() => { window.scrollTo(0, document.body.scrollHeight); document.querySelector('h1').style.color = 'red'; }); console.log('DOM manipulated via evaluate'); await browser.close(); })();

expected_output.example:
DOM manipulated via evaluate

Page scrolled and styles modified
